title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1275.1 - Pedestrian travel restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1275.1 - Pedestrian travel restricted

State Regulations

No person shall travel on any portion of the air terminal
except upon the roads, walks or places provided for the particular class of
traffic; nor occupy the roads or walks in such manner as to hinder or obstruct
their proper use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1275.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
